docs.text: Welcome to Lora by Arduitronics.com แหล่งเผยแพร่ความรู้การใช้งาน Lora Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout 1 2 3 4 mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
